main: Gains {status:Combustion} on attacks and loses some on evade. Her passive gives her {status:AttackUp} based on her {status:Combustion}.
At 30+ {status:Combustion}, her S3 triggers S3-2 instead. S3-2 has increased power and atk weight based on missing HP but kills her after use. Max atk weight (5) at 20% HP and max power at 10% HP.
The first time she goes below 20% HP, she brings her {status:Combustion} up to 30 if she has less than that, so she can use her S3-2 immediately.
On death, she spreads some of the {status:Combustion} on herself across all enemies and generates bonus EGO resources. If it was due to using S3-2, she inflicts more {status:Combustion}.
Cannot be staggered or die from {status:Combustion} damage.

1021101.desc: Cannot be Staggered or fall below 1 HP due to [Combustion] damage.
1021101.name: Fireproof

1021111.desc:
Combat Start: at 80%+ missing HP, and at less than 30 [Combustion], gain up to 30 [Combustion] (once per Encounter)

Turn End: gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn for every 6 [Combustion] on self (max 5)

On death, activate the following:
- Inflict 2 [Combustion] on all enemies; inflict [Combustion] on self between all enemies (max 3 per enemy)
- Gain 2 E.G.O resource for 2 least-owned E.G.O resources

If this unit died due to the A.B.S. Max Attunement 【Degraded Corrosion】 Skill, enhance the effect:
- Inflict 3 [Combustion] on all enemies; inflict [Combustion] on self between all enemies (max 5 per enemy)
- Gain 2 E.G.O resource for 2 least-owned E.G.O resources
- If this unit had 30+ [Combustion], apply 3 [AttackUp] to 1 ally that gets Substituted in
1021111.name: Flame Moth

1021121.desc:
When 1 ally with the least SP inflicts [Combustion] with a Base Attack Skill's On Hit effect, inflict 2 additional [Combustion] (3 times max)
- If the target the ally is attacking has 30+ [Combustion], inflict +1 [Combustion] Count instead (3 times max)
1021121.name: Residual Heat
